Class ProgramFunctions

    • startScene

      public static void startScene(ChattyScene scene, WindowData windowData)
      This method switches the scene to another.
      Parameters:
      scene - the scene this function needs to switch to
      windowData - the data the function needs to give to the new scene

      text - the text for the context of the alert
